tool.name: Filter orthologs
tool.description: to only retain orthologs suitable for further analysis

param.name: filtermultiplecogs
param.label: Filter multiple COGs
param.help: Filter orthologs where multiple different COGs are assigned to various strains

param.name: filterrecombination
param.label: Filter recombination
param.help: Filter orthologs where there is evidence of recombination within an ortholog based upon phylogenetic tree inspection

tool.help:
This tool allows you to filter out orthologs in a number of different ways, as detailed above.
This tool will carry over 'missing' COG annotations within ortholog files if "Filter multiple COGs" is enabled.
